item.title: About
item.description: Hi ðŸ‘‹ My name is Pedro. I’m a full-stack developer with a passion for code quality, healthy team dynamics and personal growth. The technologies I’m most experienced with are Ruby on Rails (9+ years) and React (5+ years), but I have worked with a few other stacks over the years - and I’m always on the look out to learn more. In my free time I enjoy working on side-projects, mentoring on Exercism, spending time with my girlfriend, exercising, gaming, stargazing and following creators on YouTube and Twitch.

item.title: Projects
